name: charred book
detailedDescription: It looks like the tattered and charred remnants of a very rare graphic novel.

attributes.defaultResult:
Yawn... It follows the typical mass-market comic book plot.
Normal person has bad experience, becomes superhero. Rich person has bereavment, becomes evil genuis nemesis.
The usual.
Even in its current state, this one looks rare so it could be worth something.
